title: AbstractIjkGridPatch
description: Definition of a collection of hexahedra which are organized and indexable by means of 3 (almost orthogonal) directions and called I, J and K. Only an abstract group type in order to be reused in GPGrid.

Ni.title: Count of cells in I direction
Ni.description: Count of cells in the I-direction (aka first and/or fastest direction) in the grid. Must be positive.

Nj.title: Count of cells in J direction
Nj.description: Count of cells in the J-direction (aka second direction) in the grid. Must be positive.

IsRightHanded.title: Is Right Handed
IsRightHanded.description: Indicates that the IJK grid is right handed, as determined by the triple product of tangent vectors in the I, J, and K directions.

IsRadial.title: Is Radial
IsRadial.description: TRUE if the grid is periodic in J, i.e., has the topology of a complete 360 degree circle.
